import userEvent from '@testing-library/user-event'; import { stat } from 'fs'; import React, { useState } from 'react' import { CoursesNav } from '../Course/CourseNav/CoursesNav' import './MyProfileStyles.css' export const MyProfile = () => { const [state, setstate] = useState({dname:"", fname :"", lname:"", tarea:""}); let name, value; const handleInputs = (e : any) => { name = e.tartget.name; value = e.target.value; setstate({...state, [name]:value }) } return (


) }
